snippet: Jorge Posada, who retired in the off-season, is the 11th former Yankee to throw the ceremonial first pitch on opening day at the Stadium.
abstract: Jorge Posada, who retired in the off-season, is the 11th former Yankee to throw the ceremonial first pitch on opening day at the Stadium.

headline.main: Posada Throws Ceremonial First Pitch, to His Father
headline.print_headline: Posada Is Embraced In Return To Stadium
